author: robbie
msg: Make PersistentStoreTest.testForcibleStartStopMidTransaction() do a syncchronous op before killing the broker to ensure all the additional messages reach the broker before it is killed. Update message numbering to be based from 1 to aid log clarity.

author: mor
msg: Fixed a bug in service makeCommunicationEventWorkEffort as OUT parameters were not defined correctly.
